lyrics:
7 contributorscodeine vision lyricschorus chris travis
down south nigga with a codeine vision
whats the outcome if you cant go in it
mane fuck it all get money and i spend it
got yo ex girl buyin codeine for christmas
down south nigga with a codeine vision
whats the outcome if you cant go in it
mane fuck it all get money and i spend it
got yo ex girl buyin codeine for christmas

verse 1 chris travis
comin round the mothafuckin corner nigga slangin shit
and naw i don’t wanna buy your drugs you can save that shit
cause i got a package of my personal favorites bitch
and i aint tryna to be cocky but these bitches makin me
young memphis nigga mane yall gotta keep ya faith in me
im just ridin holdin my cup so i wont waste this shit
one blunt left fuck you all ima face this bitch
and i don’t give a warning my dog im just takin shit
then the other night old girl was on some other shit
i told her like this her main nigga cant fuck with me
just like that told his bitch to come fuck with me
she sippin on my lean but i told her aint no trustin me
she said alright just keep your mind open chris
and so after that my mind been on this vision bitch
and shout out to all the pretty women that’s listenin
and after this tape i know my ex is gon be missin me bitch
you might also likechorus chris travis
down south nigga with a codeine vision
whats the outcome if you cant go in it
mane fuck it all get money and i spend it
got yo ex girl buyin codeine for christmas
down south nigga with a codeine vision
whats the outcome if you cant go in it
mane fuck it all get money and i spend it
got yo ex girl buyin codeine for christmas

verse 2 chris travis
wavy as shit mane my bitch gotta stand out
and niggas ask for shit but i dont give no handouts
told my new bitch im goin over your friend house
smoke some weed and had a threesome
fuck in her penthouse
fuckin bitches sippin lean boy thats on my been bouts
scarin all you bitch niggas tryna be a send out
if you fake up in the picture then you just gone fade out
his main bitch told me i should bring her fuckin fangs out
yes them gold fronts make a bitch pull her pants down

outro chris travis
make a bitch pull her pants down
make a bitch pull her pants down1embed
